content: three rounds of tall stitches come together over double_crochet and single_crochet rounds to create this playful argyle crochet square use two colors to offset each other or one color for a clean yet still textured look either way with process photos and video tutorials this 12-inch afghan block is easier than it looks level up your crochet skills with the archie argyle square pattern an intermediate pattern with photos and tutorials to make it accessible to all crocheters this one-piece seamless square features tall post stitches for a textured look the pattern includes written instructions process photos and a video tutorial to guide you through the process create a stunning afghan block with the brava worsted yarn from knit picks / wecrochet **unique features-** intermediate level pattern for skill advancement front and back post stitches for textured design seamless construction for a polished finish written instructions and video tutorial for guidance **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn brava worsted worsted weight 155-175 yards gauge 15 stitches by 7 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
